logic_summary: Added ranks 6 and 7 to ranked_differential_diagnosis as requested.
Replaced 'Pure-tone audiometry' and removed 'Speech audiometry' in V1 tests, substituting them with the single 'Hearing screening' entry provided.

value.label: Postural-Induced Intracranial Pressure Changes
value.rationale_short: Ruled out; spikes remained unchanged in amplitude and frequency across 90° upright, 0° supine, and 30° reclined positions.

value.label: Contraction of Mouth Musculature
value.rationale_short: Ruled out; spike amplitude remained at baseline (20 dB SPL) with jaw held open.

value.name: Hearing screening
value.result_summary: Passed hearing screening at 20 dB HL from 250 to 8,000 Hz bilaterally. No specific pure-tone thresholds or speech audiometry performed on the participant.
